MemoryIndex

class babydragon.memory.indexes.memory_index.MemoryIndex[source]

Bases: object

this class is a wrapper for a faiss index, it contains information about the format of the index the faiss index itself

Parameters:

  • index (Index | None) –

  • values (List[str] | None) –

  • embeddings (List[List[float] | ndarray] | None) –

init_index(index=None, values=None, embeddings=None, is_embed_batched=False)[source]

initializes the index, there are 4 cases: 1. we create a new index from scratch 2. we create a new index from a list of embeddings and values 3. we create a new index from a faiss index and values list 4. we load an index from a file

Parameters:

  • index (Index | None) –

  • values (List[str] | None) –

  • embeddings (List[List[float] | ndarray] | None) –

  • is_embed_batched (bool) –

Return type:

None

classmethod from_pandas(data_frame, columns=None, name='memory_index', save_path=None, in_place=True, embeddings_col=None, markdown='text/markdown')[source]

Initialize a MemoryIndex object from a pandas DataFrame.

Parameters:

  • data_frame (DataFrame | str) – The DataFrame or path to a CSV file.

  • columns (str | List[str] | None) – The columns of the DataFrame to use as values.

  • name (str) – The name of the index.

  • save_path (str | None) – The path to save the index.

  • in_place (bool) – Whether to work on the DataFrame in place or create a copy.

  • embeddings_col (str | None) – The column name containing the embeddings.

  • markdown (str) –

Returns:

A MemoryIndex object initialized with values and embeddings from the DataFrame.

Return type:

MemoryIndex

classmethod from_hf_dataset(dataset_url, value_column, embeddings_column=None, name='memory_index', save_path=None, embedder=<class 'babydragon.models.embedders.cohere.CohereEmbedder'>, is_batched=False, markdown='text/markdown')[source]

Initialize a MemoryIndex object from a Hugging Face dataset.

Parameters:

  • dataset_url (str) – The URL of the Hugging Face dataset.

  • value_column (str) – The column of the dataset to use as values.

  • embeddings_column (str | None) – The column of the dataset containing the embeddings.

  • name (str) – The name of the index.

  • save_path (str | None) – The path to save the index.

  • embedder (OpenAiEmbedder | CohereEmbedder | None) –

  • is_batched (bool) –

  • markdown (str) –

Returns:

A MemoryIndex object initialized with values and embeddings from the Hugging Face dataset.

token_bound_query(query, k=10, max_tokens=4000)[source]

Query the faiss index for the top-k most similar values to the query, but bound the number of tokens retrieved by the max_tokens parameter
